extendedInfo.description: Energy Tank is free battery widget that is themed to look like classic video game health / energy bars.Currently available themes include:- Metroid (8-bit)- Super Metroid (16-bit)- Mega Man (8-bit)- Mega Man X (16-bit)- Zelda (8-bit)- Zelda (16-bit)Note: If the widget does not show up, first try launching the "Energy Tank" icon from the "Apps" tab of the App Launcher. Then look on the "Widgets" tab for the widget.How to use Energy Tank:- On older versions of Android long-press on the homescreen and select "Widget" then select the "Energy Tank" widget.- On newer versions of Android open the App Launcher and click on the "Widget" tab. Find the "Energy Tank" widget and long-press to drag it to your homescreen.- The preferences will open up when you add a new widget. Select the theme you want here and press the back button to apply the changes.- You can add multiple widgets and each can have its own preferences at the same time.Accessing Preferences of Existing Widgets:- Short-press on a widget to view / modify it's preferences.Resizing the Widget:- Resizing of the widget works on Android 4.x and may not work in older versions of Android. That is a shortcoming of the Android API.- Long-press on the widget to adjust the widget size.- Then short-press to access preferences and adjust the "Render Size" to the optimal appearance on your particular device.Please rate my app and give me feedback. Tell me what additional themes and features would you like to see in future versions.Energy Tank is a freely available fan-developed app. Metroid, Mega Man and Zelda are registered trademarks of Nintendo and Capcom. Energy Tank is not affiliated with any of these companies.

reviews.title: Cool app but...
reviews.comment: I wish it would refresh more often, so it could be more accurate. Other then that, its awesome.
reviews.author: Nestor Martinez

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: I can\'t use it at all it just says find energy tank in the widget part of you manager and it doesn\'t allow appear there.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilhour

reviews.title: Looks epic, but...
reviews.comment: For some odd rwason i cannot get it to become any larger than a 1x1 widget. Looks tiny. :p  Other than that, the widget looks beautiful and there requires no special permissions. Love it. Deserves 5 stars.
reviews.author: Anthony Bohnsack

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Looks and works great, would love a means to link into battery stats from the widget.
reviews.author: Stephen Cothren

reviews.title: \"Little\" Problem...
reviews.comment: This app would be 5 stars if i could get it to change size, it\'s struck at 1x1... update soon and fix this because this app is awesome otherwise!
reviews.author: Benjamin Croom

reviews.title: Metroid!!
reviews.comment: Great app, it could update a little more often, but other then that, it\'s fun having energy tanks for my battery! 4.5/5!
reviews.author: Colton Matson

reviews.title: It brings back memories
reviews.comment: Cool idea, and nice implementation. Love the new themes!
reviews.author: Jeff Van Boxtel

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Great app but it wont change from the small size. My bf loves blue bomber but cant see well so he wont be able to use ut and it ruins my surprise.
reviews.author: Nikita ONeal

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using it for a while and I love it! I hope you guys release a 32-bit option!

reviews.comment: Best app ever.

reviews.title: Won\'t read 99-90%
reviews.comment: It can\'t show 90-99% help and fix.

reviews.title: Ingenious
reviews.comment: Its perfect. I love it :-D

reviews.comment: great!i have no complain

reviews.title: Looks awesome
reviews.comment: The widget looks nice but it portrays the wrong number for how much juice is left, on the S3 at least.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Cool
reviews.author: Corey Martin

reviews.comment: Doesnt appear on widget tab.  Reinstalling doesnt help.  Stay away
reviews.author: Joubqa L

reviews.title: Glad I found this
reviews.comment: Its a really cool battery meter, though i do wish it refreshed itself more often. Also could there be an option to have Zero\'s health bar instead of just X\'s?
reviews.author: Donavan Ford

reviews.title: I like it but...
reviews.comment: Metriod themes work on my phone but Megaman themes do not; please fix.  It has become my new battery widget & probably remain that way for some time.  Suggestion: The marine\'s face on Doom with/& percentage left in Doom\'s red font.  Update:  All themes work for me now after this app received an update!
reviews.author: Mark Garrett, Jr.

reviews.title: It\'s good.
reviews.comment: The only complaints I have are that 1) The scaling function doesn\'t seem to work? To be fair, I have yet to try scaling it on a blank page. 2) It has problems with centering. Whenever I add the title the meter goes off center. And 3) It needs to auto-refresh. Will definitely be giving 5 stars if this problem is fixed, and will test the scaling function on a blank page and update.
reviews.author: Matthew Roche

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Pretty neat. Works as it should, and looks great.
reviews.author: Ruben Almodovar
